Election 2020 
Election 2020 Kamala Harris shaped by Berkeley and a ‘do something’ mother
When Kamala Harris wants to make a particularly strong point, there’s one person she almost always quotes: her mother. Much of who Harris is today traces back to her childhood in Berkeley in the 1960s and early ’70s.
